sentences.english: Alleviate various muscles to ache and muscle spasm.
sentences.chinese: 缓解各种肌肉酸痛及肌肉痉挛。

sentences.english: Most of her jerky, almost spasmodic except her walk.
sentences.chinese: 大多数她干，她几乎痉挛除步行。

sentences.english: Current smoking was the most significant independent predictor of coronary vasospasm.
sentences.chinese: 抽烟是最显著的冠状动脉痉挛预测因子。

sentences.english: Figure 12. Raynaud disease in a 39-year-old man with cold-induced vasospasm.
sentences.chinese: 雷诺氏病，39岁，男，感冒引起的血管痉挛。

sentences.english: Another study at Duke is accepting young children who have what is called spastic cerebral palsy.
sentences.chinese: 另一项研究是在杜克接受谁有所谓痉挛性脑瘫的儿童。

sentences.english: Objective To study the preventive effect of azathioprine on chronic cerebral vasospasm(CVS).
sentences.chinese: 目的观察免疫抑制药物对慢性脑血管痉挛的预防作用。

sentences.english: A spasm of anguish shot through her, and she returned him no answer.
sentences.chinese: 她不禁痛苦得全身一阵痉挛，没有答理他的话。

sentences.english: The smell of it twisted my stomach.
sentences.chinese: 它的味道让我的胃痉挛起来。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the effect of speech therapy on severe hyperkinetic dysarthria.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察言语训练对于重度痉挛型构音障碍效果分析。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate methods of treatment for hemifacial spasm.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨治疗面肌痉挛的新方法及并发症预防。

sentences.english: Objective To explore mental health state of patients with blepharospasm and hemifacial spasm.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨睑肌及面肌痉挛病人有无异常心理健康状态。

sentences.english: Spasmodic involuntary twitching of muscles that are usually under voluntary control.
sentences.chinese: 随意肌发生不可控制的痉挛情形。

sentences.english: His heart thumped audibly as his benumbed hand held the receiver in a desperate grip.
sentences.chinese: 他的心怦怦跳着，痉挛的手死死地攥住电话听筒。

sentences.english: Spasm of the small labyrinthine vessels can give rise to vertigo and hearing loss.
sentences.chinese: 小迷路血管痉挛能引起眩晕和听力丧失。

sentences.english: Cutaneous needle was used on the recessive side of spasm limbs of hemiplegia.
sentences.chinese: 梅花针轻扣偏瘫肢体痉挛劣势侧。

sentences.english: Apart from a little hyperkinesia, his injury is now almost fully recovered.
sentences.chinese: 除了有点痉挛，他的伤现在几乎完全恢复了。

definition: sharp pain/cramp/griping pain/colic/angina, cf 心絞痛|心绞痛
to twitch/to throb/a spasm/to extract and use
the four limbs of the body
